src:
Imbas Gedung Hailai Jakut Terbakar, TransJ Perpendek Rute Menuju Ancol
05 Nov 2019, 08:13 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Kebakaran Gedung Hailai, Ancol, Jakarta Utara, berimbas pada rute Bus TransJakarta. TransJakarta melakukan perpendekan rute yang menuju ke Ancol.
Kepala Divisi Sekretaris Korporasi dan Humas PT Transportasi Jakarta, Nadia Diposanjoyo mengatakan, perpendekan rute TransJakarta dilakukan untuk koridor 5 atau rute Kampung Melayu-Ancol.
Rute tersebut digunting hanya sampai Pademangan. "Rute menjadi Kampung Melayu-Pademangan, terkait adanya kebakaran di sekitar Ancol," kata Nadia, dalam keterangannya, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Perpendekan rute ini berlaku sejak pukul 05.00 WIB. Untuk sementara, kata Nadia, Bus TransJakarta mengarah ke Ancol tidak melewati Halte Ancol.
Sebelumnya, kebakaran di Gedung Hailai sudah padam sejak pukul 03.00 WIB. Saat ini disebutkan masih dilakukan proses pendinginan agar tak terjadi lagi titik api dari dalam gedung.
"Api padam pukul 03.00 WIB. Sekarang dalam proses pendinginan," kata Kasudin Gulkarmat Jakarta Utara Satriadi Gunawan.

(idn/aan)
text:
Impact of North Jakarta's Hailai Building Burned, TransJ Shortens Route to Ancol
05 Nov 2019, 08:13 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - The Hailai Building Fire, Ancol, North Jakarta, affected the TransJakarta Bus route. TransJakarta shortens the route to Ancol.
Head of the Corporate Secretary and Public Relations Division of PT Transportasi Jakarta, Nadia Diposanjoyo, said the shortening of the TransJakarta route was carried out for corridor 5 or the Kampung Melayu-Ancol route.
The route was cut only to Pademangan. "The route becomes Kampung Melayu-Pademangan, related to the fire around Ancol," said Nadia, in her statement, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
Short for this route is valid since 05.00 WIB. For a while, said Nadia, the TransJakarta Bus heading to Ancol does not pass through Ancol Stop.
Previously, the fire at the Hailai Building had been extinguished since 03.00 WIB. At present it is said that the cooling process is still being carried out so that no more hotspots from the building occur.
"The fire went out at 3:00 a.m. It is now in the process of cooling," said Kasudin Gulkarmat North Jakarta Satriadi Gunawan.

(idn / aan)
